dct_title_s: Amplissimae regionis Mississipi seu provinciae Ludoviciana
dct_alternative_sm: Amplissimae regionis Mississipi seu provinciae Ludoviciana a r. p. Ludovico hennepin francise. miss. in America septentrionali anno 1687 detectae, nunc Gallorum coloniis et actionum negotiis toto orbe celeberrimae nova tabula edita / Io. Bapt. Homanne.
dct_description_sm: Shows United States west to New Mexico, parts of Canada and Mexico.
Shows routes of various explorers to 1716.
Cartouche in upper right surrounding title and view of Niagra Falls.
Includes cartouche enclosing a bison with two Native Americans, an opossum and a pelican in lower right.
Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
